title: Sometimes God Has a Kid's Face
description: For years, runaway children have been forced into abuse, slavery, and homelessness as a consequence of their decision. Father Bruce Ritter, is an ordained priest in the Roman Catholic Church as a member of the Franciscan Order in Rome as of 1965. He fed them, gave them a bed, talked to them and understood them. He tells their stories with great detail and realism. By telling the stories of America's exploited street children, Bruce Ritter exposes this issue in hopes that we all take action before it is too late......for the children.
author: Bruce Ritter
